creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
culture: Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Ojibwe
description: last supper type arrangement with seven figures seated at a table while a pregnant woman stands at the L edge of the composition; general pink/blue/purple color palette; "Vatican Cafe" is written in mirror above Christ figure's head
signed: Signed and dated LL corner in blue paint: JIM DENOMIE 14
title: Vatican Cafe
